column3: News;Published:------ 2 foreigners were sent to the Office of Immigration on November 8
column4: 2018.------The pair were named as RICHARD ANTHONY ALLEN  an American with date of birth 23 January 1969
column8: 1971.------The men were picked up at a house on Street 158. Boeung Raeng commune
column9: Khan Daun Penh. When questioned it was found that they had no passports and no memory of when they came to Cambodia
column10: or how long they have stayed without visas.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/132477
